snippet: The Saudi stock regulator said foreign investors will be allowed to trade on the Tadawul, the country’s main bourse.
abstract: Capital Market Authority, Saudi Arabia's stock market regulator, announces plans to allow foreign investors to trade shares on Tadawul exchange starting in June.
lead_paragraph: The Saudi stock regulator said foreign investors will be allowed to trade on the Tadawul, the country’s main bourse.

headline.main: Saudi Exchange to Permit Trading by Foreign Investors
headline.print_headline: Saudi Exchange to Permit Trading by Foreign Investors
